00026 #ifndef _QUANTBIRDSEED_H_
00027 #define _QUANTBIRDSEED_H_
00028 
00029 
00030 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00031 #include "chipstream/QuantGTypeMethod.h"
00032 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodExprReport.h"
00033 //
00034 #include "birdseed-dev/PriorsReader.h"
00035 #include "util/Util.h"
00036 //
00037 
00038 class QuantBirdseed : public QuantGTypeMethod {
00039 
00040   public:
00041     /** Constructor, currently creates prior estimates from pre-calculated data from R. */
00042   QuantBirdseed(double confidenceThreshold, double correctionFactor);
00043 
00044   virtual ~QuantBirdseed();
00045   virtual void setQuantExprMethod(QuantExprMethod *qMethod) = 0;
00046   virtual QuantExprMethod *getQuantExprMethod() = 0;
00047   virtual void setVerbosity(int v) = 0;
00048   virtual void setClusterOutFile(const std::string& clusterOutPath);
00049   
00050     virtual std::string getModelFile() { return m_ClusterOutFile; }
00051     virtual void setGenders(const std::vector<affx::Gender> &genders) {
00052                 m_Genders = genders;
00053     }
00054     virtual std::vector<affx::Gender> &getGenders() {
00055         return m_Genders;
00056     }
00057         virtual void setPriorFile(const std::string& priorsPath, const std::string &chipType, 
00058                     std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToLoad, 
00059                     const std::map<std::string, std::pair< int, int > > &specialSnps) = 0;
00060         
00061   /** 
00062    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00063    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00064    * 
00065    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00066    * @param iMart  - intensity holder
00067    * 
00068    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00069    */
00070   virtual bool prepare(const IntensityMart &iMart);
00071 
00072     /** 
00073      * @brief Set up the quantification method given all the data about the probe
00074      * set, chip layout and data.
00075      * 
00076      * @param psGroup - Probes to be used for final estimate.
00077      * @param iMart - Raw data from chips.
00078      * @param iTrans - Transformations to be applied to data before use.
00079      * @param pmAdjust - How to estimate background, or MM probe.
00080      * @return True if setup sucessful, false otherwise.
00081      */
00082     virtual bool setUp(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00083                        const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00084                        std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00085                        PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00086         
00087     virtual void blankSelf();
00088 
00089 
00090     virtual void setParameters(PsBoard &board);
00091 
00092   protected:
00093     QuantExprMethod *m_QuantMethod; ///< Quantification method used for summarizing snps.
00094     std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> m_Reporters;   ///< Report object for outputting results
00095     double m_ConfidenceThreshold;
00096     double m_CorrectionFactor;
00097   
00098     std::vector<double> m_Confidences; ///< Our resulting confidences in those calls.
00099     std::vector<std::vector<double> > m_Distances; ///< Our resulting distances for AA, AB, and BB genotypes.
00100   
00101     std::vector<affx::Gender> m_Genders;     ///< What gender is each sample?
00102 
00103     std::set<std::string> m_ChrXSNPs;
00104 
00105     std::auto_ptr<birdseed::dev::PriorsReader> m_PriorsReader;
00106     int verbosity;
00107     std::auto_ptr<std::ofstream> m_ClusterOstrm;
00108     
00109     std::string m_ClusterOutFile;
00110 
00111 };
